p: Costs were higher in cases transfused without criteria despite the shorter hospitalisation time, type of hospitalisation Intensive Care Unit (RW) or Regular Ward (RW) and dengue classification. Importantly, hospitalisations in the ICU and Severe Dengue (SD) are more expensive, and longer hospitalisation time results in greater expenses [ 12, 15, 44, 45]. However, in patients not transfused with criteria, hospitalisation time was higher than that in patients not transfused without criteria (p = 0.022).
